description: 50 pertanyaan untuk pemula, seperti memperkenalkan diri, keluarga, dan hal-hal sederhana sehari-hari.

questions.question: What is your name?
How old are you?
Where are you from?
What is your favorite color?
Do you have any siblings?
What is your favorite food?
What do you like to do in your free time?
Can you describe your best friend?
What is your favorite animal?
What do you do every morning?
Can you tell me about your family?
What is your favorite season?
What time do you usually wake up?
Do you have a pet? What is it?
What is your favorite subject at school?
What is your favorite drink?
What kind of music do you like?
Can you name a country you want to visit?
What is your favorite sport?
What do you usually eat for breakfast?
What is your hobby?
Do you like reading books? Which one is your favorite?
What is your favorite movie?
Do you like playing video games? Which one is your favorite?
Can you describe your favorite toy?
What do you like to do on weekends?
Can you name your favorite holiday?
What is your favorite fruit?
What do you usually wear to school or work?
Can you describe your house?
Do you like drawing or painting? What do you draw?
What is your favorite TV show?
Can you name a friend from school or work?
What do you do before going to bed?
Do you like dancing? Can you describe a dance you know?
What is your favorite dessert?
Do you like traveling? Where did you go last time?
Can you describe your favorite book?
What is your favorite game?
Do you like camping? Have you ever been camping?
What is your favorite place in your town?
Can you name your favorite teacher?
What do you usually do during holidays?
What is your favorite vegetable?
Do you like swimming? Where do you swim?
What do you want to be when you grow up?
Do you have a favorite teacher? What subject do they teach?
What is your favorite park or playground?
Do you like shopping? What do you usually buy?
What do you usually do after school or work?
